articles.title: Afghans Wonder ‘What About Me?’ as US Troops Prepare to Withdraw - The New York Times
articles.description: Many Afghans fear that without the umbrella of American protection, the country will be unable to preserve its modest gains toward democracy and women’s rights.
articles.content:
As American troops prepare to leave and fractures form in the Afghan government, militias controlled by powerful local warlords are once more rising to prominence and attacking government forces.

articles.title: Biden to pull US troops from Afghanistan by 11 September, sources say - News24
articles.description: WASHINGTON, April 13  - President Joe Biden has decided to withdraw U.S. troops from Afghanistan by Sept. 11, 2021, 20 years to the day after al Qaeda's attacks triggered America's longest war, three sources familiar with the decision told Reuters.
